Battle Cards

Vandalize

  1. If I choose Weapons and my opponent has characters with Weapons in either Utility or Armor slots, are those Weapons scrapped?
    Yes. It only matters what kind of Upgrade it is, not what slot itâ€™s in.
  2. If I have Captain Starscream in bot mode, and I play Vandalize, and scrapping, say, two upgrades on Enemy 1 and one upgrade on Enemy 2, do I then do two damage to Enemy 1, and one damage to Enemy 2?
    Correct.
